mapper.insert: INSERT INTO artist (name, birthday, agency, nationality, contents, registrant, created_date) VALUES (#{name}, #{birthday}, #{agency}, #{nationality}, #{contents}, #{registrant}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, birthday, agency, nationality, contents, registrant, created_date, modified_date FROM artist WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE artist SET name = #{artist.name}, birthday = #{artist.birthday}, agency = #{artist.agency}, nationality = #{artist.nationality}, contents = #{artist.contents}, modified_date = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
